para.text: The Hearing Examiner or the Arbitrator may require payment by the agency of reasonable attorney fees if the appellant is the prevailing party and payment is warranted in the interest of justice.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added May 15, 1990, D.C. Law 8-127, § 2(e), 37 DCR 2093

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 14-166 designated subsec. (a) and added subsec. (b).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Pursuant to its own terms, subsection (b) expired one year after June 28, 2002.
Section 7034 of D.C. Law 17-219 repealed section 3 of D.C. Law 14-166.
